name: skyfom-orchestration
description: Autonomous multi-agent orchestration system for Claude Code with parallel development, loop control, and circuit breaker safety. Supports up to 7 parallel agents with autonomous task completion, rate limit resilience, and intelligent epic discovery. Inspired by Ralph for Claude Code.
author: Skyfom Team
features: Autonomous loop control with dual-condition exit gate (EXIT_SIGNAL + completion indicators)
Circuit breaker protection (5 no-progress, 10 repeated errors)
Rate limit resilience with auto-retry every 60s
True parallel execution (single message, multiple Task calls)
Intelligent epic discovery and creation (optional epic ID)
Token optimization and tracking (100k ideal, 200k max)
Epic breakdown and task management via Beads
Comprehensive skill system (14 skills: 12 atomic + 2 composite)
Dependency resolution and hybrid execution modes

skills.skyfom-cto: Architect for epic breakdown and ADR creation
skills.skyfom-mobile-developer: React Native with Expo mobile development
skills.skyfom-fullstack-developer: Composite skill: Backend + Frontend + Mobile in parallel
skills.skyfom-feature-complete: Composite skill: Development + QA + Review + Design in parallel

commands.skyfom-orchestrate: Start multi-agent orchestration for an epic
